docs: Delegation currently disabled while developing on main chain.

instructions.name: set_delegate
docs: Only writes the delegate key into the account data.

errors.name: InvalidHeroCount
errors.msg: hero count must be between 1 and 4

errors.name: HeroNotOwned
errors.msg: hero does not belong to player

errors.name: HeroAlreadyActive
errors.msg: hero is currently active in a different adventure

errors.name: HeroLockOwnerMismatch
errors.msg: hero state account belongs to a different player

errors.name: HeroUnavailable
errors.msg: hero is not available for adventures

errors.name: AdventureOwnerMismatch
errors.msg: player mismatch for this adventure session

errors.name: MovementIntoWall
errors.msg: cannot move into a wall tile

errors.name: NoPortalAtPosition
errors.msg: no portal available at this position

errors.name: ResetBlocked
errors.msg: reset is blocked while heroes are inside

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: caller is not authorized to perform this action

errors.name: NoChestAtPosition
errors.msg: no chest available at this position

errors.name: NoPendingEncounter
errors.msg: no combat encounter available to begin

errors.name: MovementBlockedInCombat
errors.msg: movement is blocked while heroes are in combat

errors.name: NotHeroTurn
errors.msg: it is not the selected hero's turn

errors.name: HeroNotAlive
errors.msg: selected hero cannot act (dead or incapacitated)

errors.name: EnemyNotAlive
errors.msg: selected enemy is not a valid target
